verses.english: The Most Merciful
verses.hausa: (Allah) Mai rahama.

verses.english: Taught the Qur'an,
verses.hausa: Yã sanar da Alƙur'ani.

verses.english: Created man,
verses.hausa: Yã halitta mutum.

verses.english: [And] taught him eloquence.
verses.hausa: Yã sanar da shi bayãni (magana).

verses.english: The sun and the moon [move] by precise calculation,
verses.hausa: Rãnã da watã a kan lissãfi suke.

verses.english: And the stars and trees prostrate.
verses.hausa: Kuma tsirrai mãsu yãɗo da itãce sunã tawãlu'i.

verses.english: And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance
verses.hausa: Kuma samã Ya ɗaukaka ta, Kuma Yã aza sikẽli.

verses.english: That you not transgress within the balance.
verses.hausa: Dõmin kada ku karkatar da sikẽlin.

verses.arabic: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلْوَزْنَ بِٱلْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا۟ ٱلْمِيزَانَ
verses.english: And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance.
verses.hausa: Kuma ku daidaita awo da ãdalci, kuma kada ku rage sikẽlin.

verses.english: And the earth He laid [out] for the creatures.
verses.hausa: Kuma ƙasã Yã aza ta dõmin tãlikai.

verses.english: Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]
verses.hausa: A cikinta akwai 'ya'yan itãcen marmari da dabĩno mai kwasfa.

verses.english: And grain having husks and scented plants.
verses.hausa: Da ƙwãya mai sõshiya da ƙamshi.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangjinku kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: He created man from clay like [that of] pottery.
verses.hausa: Yã halitta mutum daga ƙẽkasasshen yumɓu kumar kasko.

verses.arabic: وَخَلَقَ ٱلْجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٍ مِّن نَّارٍ
verses.english: And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire.
verses.hausa: Kuma ya halitta aljani daga bira daga wutã.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: [He is] Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets.
verses.hausa: Ubangjin mafita biyu na rãnã, kuma Ubangijin mafãɗã biyu na rãnã.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: He released the two seas, meeting [side by side];
verses.hausa: Yã garwaya tẽku biyu (ruwan dãɗi da na zartsi) sunã haɗuwa.

verses.english: Between them is a barrier [so] neither of them transgresses.
verses.hausa: A tsakãninsu akwai shãmaki, bã za su ƙetare haddi ba.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: From both of them emerge pearl and coral.
verses.hausa: Lu'ulu'u da murjãni na fita daga gare su.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ كَٱلْأَعْلَـٰمِ
verses.english: And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains.
verses.hausa: Kuma Yanã da manyan jirãge, waɗanda ake ƙãgãwa a cikin tẽku kamar manyan duwãtsu.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: Everyone upon the earth will perish,
verses.hausa: Dukkan wanda ke kanta mai ƙãrẽwa ne.

verses.arabic: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلْجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
verses.english: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.
verses.hausa: Kuma Fuskarar Ubangijinka, Mai girman Jalala da karimci, ita ce take wanzuwa.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِى شَأْنٍ
verses.english: Whoever is within the heavens and earth asks Him; every day He is bringing about a matter.
verses.hausa: wanda ke a cikin sammai da ƙasã yanã rõƙon Sa (Allah), a kullum Allah na a cikin wani sha'ani.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: We will attend to you, O prominent beings.
verses.hausa: Zã mu ɗauki lõkaci sabõda ku, yã kũ mãsu nauyin halitta biyu!

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.arabic: يَـٰمَعْشَرَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ إِنِ ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَن تَنفُذُوا۟ مِنْ أَقْطَارِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنفُذُوا۟ ۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ
verses.english: O company of jinn and mankind, if you are able to pass beyond the regions of the heavens and the earth, then pass. You will not pass except by authority [from Allah].
verses.hausa: Ya jama'ar aljannu da mutãne! Idan kunã iya zarcẽwa daga sãsannin sammai da ƙasã to ku zarce. Bã za ku iya zarcẽwaba fãce da wani dalĩli.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.arabic: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَاظٌ مِّن نَّارٍ وَنُحَاسٌ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ
verses.english: There will be sent upon you a flame of fire and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves.
verses.hausa: Anã sako wani harshe daga wata wutã a kanku, da narkakkiyar tagulla. To, bã zã ku nẽmi taimako ba?

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَةً كَٱلدِّهَانِ
verses.english: And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil -
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan idan sama ta tsãge kuma ta zama jã kamar jar fãta.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.arabic: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُسْـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٌ وَلَا جَآنٌّ
verses.english: Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn.
verses.hausa: To, a ran nan bã zã a tambayi wani mutum laifinsa ba, kuma haka aljani.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.arabic: يُعْرَفُ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسِيمَـٰهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِى وَٱلْأَقْدَامِ
verses.english: The criminals will be known by their marks, and they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet.
verses.hausa: zã a iya sanin mãsu laifi da alãmarsu, sabõda haka sai a kãma kwarkaɗarsu da sãwãyensu.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.arabic: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.english: This is Hell, which the criminals deny.
verses.hausa: Wannan Jahannama ce wadda mãsu laifi ke ƙaryatãwa game da ita.

verses.english: They will go around between it and scalding water, heated [to the utmost degree].
verses.hausa: Sunã kẽwaya a tsakaninta da ruwan ɗimi mai tsananin tafasa.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: But for he who has feared the position of his Lord are two gardens -
verses.hausa: Kuma wanda ya ji tsõron tsayãwa a gaba ga Ubangijinsa yanã da Aljanna biyu.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: Having [spreading] branches.
verses.hausa: Mãsu rassan itãce.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: In both of them are two springs, flowing.
verses.hausa: A cikinsu akwai marẽmari biyu sunã gudãna.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: In both of them are of every fruit, two kinds.
verses.hausa: A cikinsu akwai nau'i biyu daga kõwane 'ya'yan itãcen marmari.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍ ۚ وَجَنَى ٱلْجَنَّتَيْنِ دَانٍ
verses.english: [They are] reclining on beds whose linings are of silk brocade, and the fruit of the two gardens is hanging low.
verses.hausa: Sunã gincire a kan waɗansu shimfiɗu cikinsu tufãfin alharĩni mai kauri ne kuma nũnannun 'yã'yan itãcen Aljannar biyu kusakusa suke.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.arabic: فِيهِنَّ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّ
verses.english: In them are women limiting [their] glances, untouched before them by man or jinni -
verses.hausa: A cikinsu akwai mãtã mãsu taƙaita ganinsu, wani mutum, gabanin mazajensu bai ɗebe budurcinsu ba kuma haka wani aljani.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: As if they were rubies and coral.
verses.hausa: Kamar dai su yaƙũtu ne da murjãni.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: Is the reward for good [anything] but good?
verses.hausa: Shin, kyautatãwa nã da wani sakamako? (Ã'aha) fãce kyautatãwa.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: And below them both [in excellence] are two [other] gardens -
verses.hausa: Kuma baicinsu akwai waɗansu gidãjen Aljanna biyu.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: Dark green [in color].
verses.hausa: Mãsu duhun inuwa.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: In both of them are two springs, spouting.
verses.hausa: A cikinsu akwai marẽmari biyu masu kwarãrar ruwa.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: In both of them are fruit and palm trees and pomegranates.
verses.hausa: A cikinsu akwai 'ya'yan itãcen marmari da dabĩno darummãni.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: In them are good and beautiful women -
verses.hausa: A cikinsu, akwai wasu mãtã mãsu kyaun hãlãye, mãsu kyaun halitta.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.english: Fair ones reserved in pavilions -
verses.hausa: Mãsu farin idãnu da baƙinsu waɗanda aka tsare a cikin haimõmi.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.arabic: لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّ
verses.english: Untouched before them by man or jinni -
verses.hausa: Wani mutum, gabanin mazajensu bai ɗẽbe budurcinsu ba, kuma haka wani aljani.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفْرَفٍ خُضْرٍ وَعَبْقَرِىٍّ حِسَانٍ
verses.english: Reclining on green cushions and beautiful fine carpets.
verses.hausa: Sunã gincire a kan wasu matãsai mãsu kõren launi da katĩfun Abkara kyãwãwa.

verses.english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
verses.hausa: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

verses.arabic: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱسْمُ رَبِّكَ ذِى ٱلْجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
verses.english: Blessed is the name of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.
verses.hausa: Sũnan Ubangjinka, Mai girman Jalãla da Karimci, ya tsarkaka.
